channel.title: Help with donaterstuff
channel.description: how can i add a shop only donaters can trade with and when anyone else trys to trade it needs to say ur not a donater and + i want that no-donaters dont get the donater items of the donater who died :confused: :confused: , thanks :P

item.title: Help with donaterstuff
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

I feel like spoon-feeding, sorry.

Well, here’s an example.

if(NPCID == ####){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 5; }

You would change that to this:

if(NPCID == ####){ if(donator == 1){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 5; } else sM("You must be a donator to trade me!!"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Help with donaterstuff
item.dc:creator: @_Joshua `Joshua
item.description:
@_Joshua wrote:

A better way to do this is to make it so the shop opens, but it doesn’t let you buy items unless you’re a donator, this can be done by editingthe method which is called when buying items.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with donaterstuff
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

Im not going to tell you how, you should learn things like this on your own. Here’s a basic quick tutorial;

*Declare the donator rank and set it to 0
*search for the shop id, and add && donator == 1) or something like that
*Then under the NPC that you are opening a shop with, put }else{ sendMessage(“You’re not a member”) wanneshop = 0;

Basically it, read the tutorial section. That’s what it is for…

Read full topic
